title: PRICING AGREEMENT RULE
description: A PRICING AGREEMENT RULE holds the conditions which apply all-over for the PRICING AGREEMENT, i.e. they are not depending on a certain product, but they just say e.g. what sales amount (threshold) has to be met (resp. exceeded) in order to get a certain percentage of rebate or discount.

rebateRate.title: rebateRate
rebateRate.description: rebate rate which is granted if the threshold is reached or exceeded

thresholdAmount.title: thresholdAmount
thresholdAmount.description: total sales amount which has to be reached or exceeded for having the rebate applied
